amendment.description: To increase the authorization of appropriations for protection of foreign missions and officials for fiscal year 2004, and to make an authorization of appropriations for expenses related to such protection that were incurred prior to October 1, 2003.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1142 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1142 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S9194; text: CR S9194) To increase the authorization of appropriations for protection of foreign missions and officials for fiscal year 2004, and to make an authorization of appropriations for expenses related to such protection that were incurred prior to October 1, 2003.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1142 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1142 proposed by Senator Clinton.
